Master of Commerce (M.Com)

The M.Com program is a specialized postgraduate course that provides an advanced understanding of commercial subjects. The curriculum delves into advanced accounting, managerial economics, corporate finance, and research methodology. This program is ideal for students who aspire to pursue a career in academia, research, or high-level finance and accounting roles.

With a focus on critical analysis and in-depth study, the M.Com program prepares graduates for leadership positions and doctoral research in commerce and management.
